name: Cool Running
description:
Сool Running is casual game for android. You must to compete with other players performing various quests.

You can compete with other players earning game currency and to buy new clothes to customizing your runner.

WARNING:
The game is in public alpha!
You must play with a friend to play the game(This will be fixed soon)!

You can:
- Create a game matches; But if the total number of players is zero, then you won't be able to create a match, so it's preferable to play with a friend (this will be fixed soon);
- Earn game money by playing;
- Customize your runner; You can to change runner body and runner head;
- Change your profile name;
- Enable/disable background and SFX audio(this is stored in your device);
- Your game data(money, profile name, deblocked body and head variants, current body and head variants) is stored in database;
